message:
想尝试远程管理数据库，发现需要固定IP，这个有办法解决么，搜了一下也没有太有价值的信息，还是求助各位技术大大吧。
一些bluehost的要求：
Remote Mysql Database Access
Add an Access Host
Use this form to setup remote access to your Mysql databases. Submit an IP or Class C to setup the remote mysql grant rules and also to allow access through the firewall.

NOTE: It is not uncommon for your ISP (dialup, Cable, DSL) to dynamically change your IP. Submitting your Class C (/24) will help to ensure that if your IP address is changed that your remote access will continue to work.
title: [求助]远程连接bluehost数据库问题
